title: Teapot
text: Of the four shipwrecks salvaged by Captain Michael Hatcher, the <I>Geldermalsen<I> has shed the most light on the Chinese Export porcelain trade.  Not only did this ship yield the greatest quantity of porcelain (140,000 pieces), but its contents can be compared with billing records, which survive in the archives of the Dutch East India Company.
description: Chinese Export blue and white porcelain; bullet-shaped form; painted with willow and peony; a terrace on a rock with a scholar\'s retreat; trellis pattern borders
creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
